<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Follow-up Assault](/Feats.aspx?ID=5837) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=680" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 81 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Requirements**
You used your previous action to make a melee [strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306) that missed.

</column>

---

Even in the face of failure you press the attack, determined to succeed. Make a Strike with the same weapon, adding the [backswing](/Traits.aspx?ID=545) and [forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=611) weapon traits to that Strike.
